mapper.select: SELECT op.ORDER_NUMBER, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, op.ORDER_PRICE, op.ORDER_COUNT, o.RECEIVER_NAME, o.PHONE_NUMBER, o.ADDRESS, i.IMAGE_URL, IFNULL((SELECT IF(r.REVIEW_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM review r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND r.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}), 0) AS IS_WRITE, o.ORDER_DATE FROM order_product op JOIN product p ON op.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID JOIN orders o ON op.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN image i ON i.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN review r ON (r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND r.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}) WHERE o.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND i.IMAGE_ID = (SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID)
